dimension: 9 1/2 x 14 7/8 in. (24.13 x 37.78 cm) (overall, including fringe)
title: Loincloth
description: Tan woven cloth with dark brown design of 2 rows of 3 bands flanking a row of diamonds and chevrons and checkerboard pattern; tan and brown fringe on 2 long sides
